meanings.sent1: The old car was dumpier than the shiny new one.
meanings.sent2: The pile of trash looked dumpier as more garbage was added to it.
meanings.sent3: The sad clown's dumpier outfit made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her mood grew dumpier as the rainy day dragged on.
meanings.sent5: The dimly lit room felt even dumpier with the musty smell lingering in the air.

meanings.sent1: The smaller dog was dumpier than the larger one.

meanings.sent3: The dumpier cake may not look pretty, but it sure tastes delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits felt dumpier as the day went on.
meanings.sent5: The dumpier chair creaked under his weight, threatening to collapse at any moment.
